Created an attachment (id=31827)
Report design that does not run and preview well

It works for me.
It seems that the design file you upload is not a valid XML, there are some encoding problems. After fix the encoding problem, I can run the report design sucessfully.

To fix the encoding problem, use a XML editor (such as XML spy) to open the design, modify the design to a valid xml, save it.
This was due to another bug that Jun fixed today.
